highlighted_projects.description: Developed an AI-assisted trip planner using Supabase and Bolt AI, automating itinerary generation and multi-tenant route management.
highlighted_projects.name: Roots & Route (Nonprofit, Canada)

highlighted_projects.description: Built a lightweight RPC framework with dynamic proxy, serialization (Kryo/Protobuf), and heartbeat checks, enabling low-latency, fault-tolerant service-to-service communication.
highlighted_projects.name: Custom Java RPC Framework (Netty)

highlighted_projects.description: Implemented leader election, log replication, and fault recovery to simulate distributed system consensus.
highlighted_projects.name: Raft Consensus Algorithm

jarvis_projects.description: Built a Linux monitoring agent on Rocky Linux to collect hardware and usage data via Bash scripts. Automated PostgreSQL data ingestion with crontab and Dockerized database container for analytics.
jarvis_projects.name: Linux Cluster Monitoring Agent

name: Avril Liu

bullets: Authorized to work in Canada until 2029.
Committed to clean code, comprehensive unit testing, and code review best practices.
others.title: Core Strengths

professional_experience.description: Built a high-throughput SMS dispatch system for OTP, alerts, and marketing campaigns. Designed a Kafka–Redis pipeline (15K+ QPS) with RESTful APIs, improved throughput by 40%, and reduced latency by 70%. Expanded the system to 12+ gateways with automatic failover and SLA monitoring using Prometheus and ELK.
professional_experience.title: Software Developer

professional_experience.description: Designed lifecycle and approval flows with gRPC/Dubbo for secure integration. Optimized MySQL indexes for 50M+ records and migrated 10M+ records losslessly via Kafka pipelines. Deployed services using Docker/Kubernetes for scalable and fault-tolerant infrastructure.
professional_experience.title: Backend Developer Intern

summary: Backend Engineer with 3+ years of experience building scalable SaaS and distributed systems focused on performance, reliability, and impact. Skilled in microservices, event-driven design, and data pipelines using Kafka, Redis, and SQL/NoSQL. Delivered high-throughput messaging platforms (15K+ QPS) with 99.9% uptime and real-time analytics for multi-tenant clients. Proficient in RESTful APIs, Docker/Kubernetes, and observability tools (Prometheus/ELK). Master’s in Computational Science, authorized to work in Canada until 2029
